posts.post_content: This card also single-handedly made the cards from Legends like [Quagmire](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Quagmire) and [Deadfall](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Deadfall) 100% useless.
posts.html:
This card also single-handedly made the cards from Legends like Quagmire and Deadfall 100% useless.

Posted By: Dr_Draco (9/25/2009 9:27:51 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
@Draco  
Not necessarily. [Quagmire](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Quagmire), [Deadfall](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Deadfall) and the like can be used to prevent people from using landwalk against you (especially if you're playing mono-color) while probably allowing your own creatures to landwalk. The Staff is preferable if you're playing a deck with no landwalking creatures (which is most of them), but the older cards still have a narrow, additional use.
posts.html:
@Draco

posts.post_content:
The biggest problem with deciding how useful this card is is the fact that so people actually use landwalk now, especially when there's plenty of ways to make a creature unblockable that don't require an opponent to have a certain type of land.
  
   
I think it's a good one to use... just not useful because there's never a **reason** to use it.
posts.html:
The biggest problem with deciding how useful this card is is the fact that so people actually use landwalk now, especially when there's plenty of ways to make a creature unblockable that don't require an opponent to have a certain type of land.

I think it's a good one to use... just not useful because there's never a reason to use it.
